title: Trump vows 'fairly substantial' chip tariffs soon
description: The United States and China are locked in a high-stakes race to develop the high-end semiconductors used to power artificial intelligence systems.
content:
U.S. President Donald Trump said Thursday the United States will soon put a "fairly substantial tariff" on semiconductors coming into the country, after previously threatening a 100-percent levy on the chips.

title: U.S. FTC prepares to grill AI companies over impact on children: Report
description: The U.S. Federal Trade Commission plans to study the impact of artificial intelligence chatbots on children’s mental health.
content:

title: Trump supports nuclear power as it is 'more American' than wind, solar, US official says
description: Agen said building out nuclear power is the third prong of the Trump administration's approach to winning the artificial intelligence race against China after extending the lifespans of aging coal plants that are retiring and increasing the efficiency of the existing electric grid. In recent weeks, President Donald Trump has deployed a range of tactics to stop offshore wind expansion, which was a cornerstone of former President Joe Biden's efforts to combat climate change but has struggled with soaring costs and supply chain snags.

content:

title: India-Singapore To Boost Bilateral Ties In Manufacturing, Semiconductor, AI, Defence & Development Of Unmanned Vessels
description: In their talks, Modi and Wong agreed to work closely to boost bilateral ties in areas such as advanced manufacturing, semiconductors, artificial intelligence, green shipping, skilling, civil nuclear energy, aviation, and defence and security, including possible cooperation in developing unmanned vessels.

title: Skip or snub? Why Elon Musk was a no-show at Donald Trump's dinner with tech CEOs
description: While Elon Musk was absent from the dinner table, one of his main rivals in artificial intelligence, OpenAI CEO Sam Altman, was present at the event.
content:
